verses.verse: He that separateth <S%H6504><s%> himself seeketh <S%H1245><s%> his own desire <S%H8378><s%>, And rageth <S%H1566><s%> against all sound wisdom <S%H8454><s%>.
A fool <S%H3684><s%> hath no delight <S%H2654><s%> in understanding <S%H8394><s%>, But only that his heart <S%H3820><s%> may reveal itself <S%H1540><s%>.
When the wicked <S%H7563><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>, there cometh <S%H935><s%> also contempt <S%H937><s%>, And with ignominy <S%H7036><s%> cometh reproach <S%H2781><s%>.

The words <S%H1697><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> are as deep <S%H6013><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>; The wellspring <S%H4726><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is as a flowing <S%H5042><s%> brook <S%H5158><s%>.
To respect <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is not good <S%H2896><s%>, Nor to turn aside <S%H5186><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
A fool <S%H3684><s%>'s lips <S%H8193><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> into contention <S%H7379><s%>, And his mouth <S%H6310><s%> calleth <S%H7121><s%> for stripes <S%H4112><s%>.
A fool <S%H3684><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> is his destruction <S%H4288><s%>, And his lips <S%H8193><s%> are the snare <S%H4170><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%>.
The words <S%H1697><s%> of a whisperer <S%H5372><s%> are as dainty morsels <S%H3859><s%>, And they go down <S%H3381><s%> into the <S%H990><s%> innermost parts <S%H2315><s%>.
He also that is slack <S%H7503><s%> in his work <S%H4399><s%> Is brother <S%H251><s%> to him that is a <S%H1167><s%> destroyer <S%H7843><s%>.
The name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a strong <S%H5797><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%>; The righteous <S%H6662><s%> runneth <S%H7323><s%> into it <S%H7682><s%>, and is safe.
The rich man <S%H6223><s%>'s wealth <S%H1952><s%> is his strong <S%H5797><s%> city <S%H7151><s%>, And as a high <S%H7682><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%> in his own imagination <S%H4906><s%>.
Before <S%H6440><s%> destruction <S%H7667><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of man <S%H376><s%> is haughty <S%H1361><s%>; And before <S%H6440><s%> honor <S%H3519><s%> goeth humility <S%H6038><s%>.
He that giveth <S%H1697><s%> answer <S%H7725><s%> before he heareth <S%H8085><s%>, It is folly <S%H200><s%> and shame unto him <S%H3639><s%>.
The spirit <S%H7307><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> will sustain <S%H3557><s%> his infirmity <S%H4245><s%>; But a broken <S%H5218><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> who can bear <S%H5375><s%>?
The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the prudent <S%H995><s%> getteth <S%H7069><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; And the ear <S%H241><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
A man <S%H120><s%>'s gift <S%H4976><s%> maketh room <S%H7337><s%> for him <S%H5148><s%>, And bringeth him before <S%H6440><s%> great men <S%H1419><s%>.
He that pleadeth his cause <S%H7379><s%> first <S%H7223><s%> seemeth just <S%H6662><s%>; But his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> and searcheth him out <S%H2713><s%>.
The lot <S%H1486><s%> causeth contentions <S%H4079><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>, And parteth <S%H6504><s%> between the mighty <S%H6099><s%>.

A brother <S%H251><s%> offended <S%H6586><s%> is harder to be won than a strong <S%H5797><s%> city <S%H7151><s%>; And such contentions <S%H4079><s%> are like the bars <S%H1280><s%> of a castle <S%H759><s%>.

A man <S%H376><s%>'s belly <S%H990><s%> shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> with the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; With the increase <S%H8393><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%> shall he be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>.
Death <S%H4194><s%> and life <S%H2416><s%> are in the power <S%H3027><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%>; And they that love <S%H157><s%> it shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit thereof <S%H6529><s%>.
Whoso findeth <S%H4672><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> findeth <S%H4672><s%> a good <S%H2896><s%> thing <S%H6329><s%>, And obtaineth favor <S%H7522><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
The poor <S%H7326><s%> useth <S%H1696><s%> entreaties <S%H8469><s%>; But the rich <S%H6223><s%> answereth <S%H6030><s%> roughly <S%H5794><s%>.

He <S%H376><s%> that maketh many friends <S%H7453><s%> doeth it to his own destruction <S%H7489><s%>; But there is <S%H3426><s%> a friend <S%H157><s%> that sticketh closer <S%H1695><s%> than a brother <S%H251><s%>.
